dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1541 IH: Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grijalva (for himself, Ms. Brown of Florida, Mr. Clay, Mr. Hastings, Ms. Clarke of New York, Mr. Vargas, and Mr. Pierluisi) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to make Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance for the establishment of preservation training and degree programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act or the PRISM Act.

section.header: Eligibility of Hispanic-serving institutions for assistance for preservation education and training programs
section.text: Section 303903(3) of title 54, United States Code, is amended by inserting to Hispanic-serving institutions (as defined in section 502(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1101a(a))), after universities,.
